page.title: 14Local Dialect.
page.content: Here are some examples of local dialect (Where are you going tonight?= Far ur ye gain'the nicht?) (I am going to my grandmother's. = Am gain' ta ma granny's). (how are you getting on at school? = Foo ur ye gettin' onat the schill?) (Quite well, how are you doing yourself? = Na bad; foo ur ye dain' yersel' ?) (I am away out to play. =Am awa oot tae play.) (Don't go away.= Dinna gine awa.) (I won't.= I winna.) (What are you doing?= Fit ur ye dain'?) (I'm not doing anything.= Am nae dain onythin'.) (What I like for my dinner is mince,potatoes.= Whit I like fir my denner is mince an'tatties.)
